en: As the big day looms closer, the spectre of failure beckons over the horizon. You begin to wonder: what will failure mean for you? You don't really want to think about what might happen if you fail, but maybe you should take a moment to figure it out... just in case?

At first, the images that flash through your head are terrible and demoralizing. But eventually your brain starts suggesting other options to you - roads you could potentially take if this doesn't pan out, contingencies.
It's not fun, but it helps you feel a less like the world will end if this doesn't go your way.
There's no need to worry about what will happen if you fail. You're not going to let that happen.
